thread.title: US urges Russians to focus airstrikes on Islamic State
thread.title_full: US urges Russians to focus airstrikes on Islamic State - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Robert Burns, Ap National Security Writer
title: US urges Russians to focus airstrikes on Islamic State
text: Photo: Russian Defense Ministry Press Service, AP In this photo made from the footage taken from Russian Defense Ministry official web site on Thursday, Oct. 1, 2015 a bomb explosion is seen in Syria. Russia’s launch of airstrikes in Syria is prompting discussions within the Pentagon about whether the U.S. should use military force to protect U.S.-trained and equipped Syrian rebels if they come under fire by the Russians. In this photo made from the footage taken from Russian Defense... WASHINGTON (AP) — Pentagon officials urged the Russian military on Thursday to focus its airstrikes in Syria on Islamic State fighters rather than opponents of Syrian President Bashar Assad, U.S. administration officials said. In this photo made from the footage taken from Russian Defense Ministry official web site on Thursday, Oct. 1, 2015 a bomb explosion is seen in Syria. Russia’s launch of airstrikes in Syria is prompting discussions within the Pentagon about whether the U.S. should use military force to protect U.S.-trained and equipped Syrian rebels if they come under fire by the Russians. In this photo made from the footage taken from Russian Defense... WASHINGTON (AP) — Pentagon officials urged the Russian military on Thursday to focus its airstrikes in Syria on Islamic State fighters rather than opponents of Syrian President Bashar Assad, U.S. administration officials said.
